lead_paragraph: SOKOLSKI--Carol, nee Stitt. On Monday, March 21, 2016, Carol Sokolski, of Silver Spring. Beloved wife of Alan Sokolski; devoted mother of Lynn Sokolski (Bentley Noland) and Lauren Sokolski, grandmother of Samantha Noland, and sister of Fred H. Stitt. A private memorial gathering will take place in April. Interment will follow later at Arlington National Cemetery. Memorial contributions may be made to Doctors Without Borders (Medecins San Frontieres). 1/3
